vocab.claim_def: What you're trying to prove in your argument
vocab.evidence_def: Concrete proof that supports your claim
vocab.counterclaim_def: The other side's argument you need to address
vocab.reasoning_def: Explain how your evidence supports your claim

vocab_lee.title: üìù Lee: Word Help
bullets: A claim is what someone believes
Evidence is proof that supports the claim
Try this frame: "I claim that ___ because ___"
vocab_lee.example: Example: "I claim that recess is important because students need exercise."

vocab_tee.title: ü§î Tee: Strategy Check
bullets: What is the writer trying to prove?
What facts or examples support their point?
Could someone disagree? What would they say?

sequence_tee.title: ü§î Tee: How to Order the Steps
bullets: First, what does Tee do? (Repeats Jayden's claim)
